title: Stop Feeling Guilty for Being Happy with Fearne Cotton
description:
If you’re a Dear Gabby listener, you know that it’s good to feel good! But do you feel that? On today’s Big Talk, my brilliant friend Fearne Cotton TOTALLY called herself out: Sometimes she feels guilty for being happy. I know many of you can relate ... so press play on this podcast! I’ll help you learn that the better you feel, the more light you can spread in this world. Feeling good is not a luxury, it’s your responsibility! I’ll also share feel-good tools that will help you surrender control and flow through the holiday season with ease .... and log a few extra hours of sleep.

 

This episode also touches on so many other ways you can surrender control and really start flowing with the Universe! You’ll learn: 

  • How to lean into joy and focus on what’s thriving, like it’s your JOB (because it is!) 

  • The power of speaking your truth and how to do it with confidence and ease 

  • How to dismantle the belief that it’s selfish to feel good (this is a MAJOR misconception!) 

  • How to master the art of allowing, so that you don’t strangle your desires with controlling energy 

  • How to tap into feelings of deep worthiness 


This Dear Gabby Big Talk also offers a profound message that will allow you to see the light—and the divine opportunity—in any dark moment. When you learn to see a difficult moment as a form of guidance, you’ll be absolutely fearless in life. 

RESOURCES:

 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

ABOUT FEARNE: Fearne Cotton is one of the top broadcasters in the U.K.—and she’s a happiness expert. This British powerhouse is the author of several books detailing her own journeys with happiness. Happy, Calm, and Quiet are must-reads! She launched the Happy Place podcast in 2018, and has gone on to interview everyone from Russell Brand to Alicia Keys. 


HAPPY DAYS BOOK LAUNCH & LIVE VIRTUAL EVENT EXPERIENCE: 
Want a FREE VIP ticket to the biggest event of 2022? When you preorder the book, Happy Days, you’ll score a FREE ticket to the Live Virtual Event Experience on February 26, 2022! Claim your spot here: deargabby.com/happydays

FREE TRAINING: Your 5-Step Guide to Unlock Purpose and Abundance: Sign up here: DearGabby.com/purpose

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. This is the key to manifesting a life beyond your wildest dreams. Each month I deliver new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/2VfIkXB
 
 
PARTNERS
 

Check out my new favorite sheets from Boll and Branch. Best Deals of the Year Going on Now from 11/1-11/11 with promo code gabby at bollandbranch.com.

 

Get your own Infrared Sauna Blanket or Infrared PEMF Mat at HigherDOSE.com today and use my exclusive Promo Code: GABBY75 at check out to save $75.
Or just go to Higherdose.com/gabby to get your $75 off today.

 

This holiday season, stock up and share your new favorite clean skincare and bodycare with your friends and family. We even have a special discount just for our listeners. Get 10% off your first order with promo code GABBY at OSEAmalibu.com.

 

Go to GreenChef.com/gabby125 and use code gabby125 to get $125 off including free shipping!

 

Produced by Dear Media.
